column1: #text=I love to read , and today I remembered that I had already finished my last mystery novel .
#text=So now it was time to head back to the library .
#text=It was a short walk , but one I enjoyed as I considered what kind of stories I would check out next .
#text=I dropped my return books into the slot at the entrance , and entered the library .
#text=Oh how I love the smell of books !
#text=I made my way over to the fiction area , and randomly layed eyes on the book bindings , until a title would catch my eye .
#text=After 2 to 3 more , I would take my selections to the check out desk .
#text=The librarian , who knows me well , smiled and noted the books I had chosen in the system .
#text=It makes the check out process so much faster now .
#text=I picked up the books on the other side , placed them in my bag , and stepped out into the autumn air .
